SEARCH
Module com.example.platformerplain
Package com.example.platformerplain.controller

Class CompletedScreenController

java.lang.Object
com.example.platformerplain.controller.CompletedScreenController
public class CompletedScreenController extends Object
This class serves as the controller for the Completed Screen in the game. It manages the initialization and configuration of UI components, including setting the background image and handling sound effects when the player completed all levels.
Author:
Zelin Xia
